mapper.select: SELECT * FROM sys_menu where del_flag = 0 and parentId=#{parentId}, and name=#{name}, and code=#{code}, and parentCode=#{parentCode}, and sort=#{sort} order by sort desc

SELECT sm.id,sm.name,sm.code,sm.url,sm.parent_id,sm.type FROM sys_menu sm inner join sys_role_menu srm on srm.menu_id = sm.id inner join sys_role sr on sr.id = srm.role_id inner join sys_user_role sur on sur.role_id = sr.id inner join sys_user su on su.id = sur.user_id where su.del_flag = 0 and su.id=#{userId}
mapper.update: update sys_menu set del_flag=1 where id=#{id}
